name: Core Release 29.9
description: We have released another version of the core release! This core release brings a few new features and improvements.

ADDED.text: Sign in with Apple : Added ability to retrieve First name and Last Name data points from Apple provider for new users.
New Link Social Identities API is added. This API will work for both manual and social account linking.

FIXED.text: Sign in with Apple feature is now compatible with iOS 12 and 13 versions.
